overview: Annelies Van Den Belt joined SUP Fabrik as its Group CEO on June 1st 2008. She has responsibility for all of SUP’s businesses, (Livejournal.com, Championat.ru, Gazeta.Ru and Sol). She came to SUP from ITV, the UK’s largest commercial broadcaster, where she was Managing Director of ITV Broadband. At ITV she oversaw the launch of ITV.com. From 2000-2005 Ms Van Den Belt worked for News International as Digital Director of The Times online sites followed by a position as Director of New Media for The Telegraph group.
